message: Thank you for contacting us. As part of our continued efforts to stop underage smoking we verify that every smoker on our mailing list is 21 years of age or older.

steps.step: STEP 1: Check to make suire the mailing address above is correct. Print any corrections in the box below on the right. Any corrections must match your ID.
STEP 2:Your signature and date of birth are required to determine your eligibility
STEP 3 Attach a copy ofyour identification.
STEP 4:Send form and copy of ID in the enclosed self-addressed envelope,or mail to Attn: Consumer RelationsP.O.Box 2959,Winston-SalemNC 27102

offer_restriction: Offer Restricted to Smokers 21 Years of Age or Older.
